post.content:
일단 급한데로 답변을 해본다면....



Actually, I have not experience of uploading files but if I should do it, I would go to

http://search.microsoft.com/default.asp

and select two categories



[v] Developer Resources

[v] Support & the Knowledge Base



and enter the keyword 'upload' and click [submit query] then you can see a lot of technical information about upload. There might be some source code too.

Maybe, you need to use specific Form data type in client script part and a module to save to server computer in server script part.



Secondly, when you use logon page, the page should use SSL protocol that can be configured from Web setting. Then, you don't have to encrypt it directly because SSL make all data encrypted when using SSL. When saving the password to database, you should encrypt it or not depending on the significance of the site. You can use very simple encode method just not to be seen easily when somebody in the company open the database.
